title: Lynda - Creating a Game Environment in Blender and Unity
description:
Lynda - Creating a Game Environment in Blender and Unity

This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been posed, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

3h 13m Intermediate Oct 21, 2015 | Uploaded in Feb 13, 2016 by 2boweb
 
Subjects: 3D + Animation Developer 
Software: Blender 
Author: Darrin Lile 
 
Learn how to model and texture a game environment, like the detailed city scene shown in this course, in Blender. Author Darrin Lile provides a "how and why" overview of the entire process, starting with modeling sections of the environment, which can be used to construct the game level in a modular way. Next Darrin shows how to UV map the objects in the scene and how to use Photoshop to create the textures. Finally, he goes over the process of exporting the assets to the Unity game engine, where he adds materials and textures and tests the scene.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Testing the scale
	â€¢	Modeling buildings and pipes
	â€¢	Creating walkways
	â€¢	UV mapping
	â€¢	Creating textures
	â€¢	Importing the scene in Unity
